name: Tong Yuen Yan Edelyn
bio: Edelyn graduated with a degree in architecture and sustainable design from SUTD, where she developed a passion for healthcare and sustainable architecture. She has contributed to various projects focusing on creating innovative, health-centric spaces. With a strong interest in computational design, Edelyn also utilizes coding for simulations and design optimization. Outside of architecture, she finds relaxation in cooking for others, finding joy in preparing meals that people enjoy.
